title: waifu2x-ncnn-vulkan invalid GPU device

labels.name: state:timedOut
labels.description: The issue owner isn't responding to questions

body:
## Environment Information

|Module|Version|
|-|-|
|`Video2X`||
|`FFmpeg`||
|`waifu2x-caffe`||
|`waifu2x-converter-cpp`||
|`waifu2x-ncnn-vulkan`||

## Symptom

Briefly describe what's going on.

## Screenshots or Error Messages

Please paste screenshots or error messages here.
Include as much details as you can, as this greatly helps debugging the problem.

Please paste your error message in the code block down below:

```Upscaling Progress:   0%|                                                                       | 0/56 [00:00<?, ?it/s]
[0 AMD Radeon HD 8600/8700M]  queueC=1[2]  queueG=0[1]  queueT=2[2]
[0 AMD Radeon HD 8600/8700M]  buglssc=0  bugihfa=0
[0 AMD Radeon HD 8600/8700M]  fp16p=1  fp16s=1  fp16a=0  int8s=1  int8a=1
invalid gpu device
[!] ERROR: Subprocess 12628 exited with code 4294967295
[!] ERROR: Subprocess execution ran into an error
[!] WARNING: Terminating all processes
2020-05-22 14:10:19.200441 [+] INFO: Killing progress monitor
Upscaling Progress:   0%|                                                                       | 0/56 [00:01<?, ?it/s]
2020-05-22 14:10:19.998679 [+] INFO: Killing upscaled image cleaner
Cleaning up cache directory: C:\Users\vichox\AppData\Local\Temp\video2x\tmp85mmk7j_
Cleaning up cache directory: C:\Users\vichox\AppData\Local\Temp\video2x\tmpsyg3gxh8
Cleaning up cache directory: C:\Users\vichox\AppData\Local\Temp\video2x
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "video2x_gui.py", line 100, in run
  File "upscaler.py", line 605, in run
  File "upscaler.py", line 525, in run

  File "upscaler.py", line 309, in _upscale_frames
  File "upscaler.py", line 379, in _wait

subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command '['C:\\Users\\vichox\\AppData\\Local\\video2x\\waifu2x-ncnn-vulkan\\waifu2x-ncnn-vulkan', '-n', '2', '-s', '2', '-t', '400', '-m', 'C:\\Users\\vichox\\AppData\\Local\\video2x\\waifu2x-ncnn-vulkan\\models-upconv_7_anime_style_art_rgb', '-g', '1', '-j', '1:1:1', '-i', 'C:\\Users\\vichox\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmp85mmk7j_', '-o', 'C:\\Users\\vichox\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmpsyg3gxh8']' returned non-zero exit status 4294967295.
```
